column5: Need to go to Ottawa next month and was just wondering if anyone knew of some public launches in the Rideau / Highway 416 area that I could launch a kayak /canoe ???  Much appreciated for any guidance someone could pass along to me ...would be nice to fish for the day before work interferes...ROOK
THANKS to you both.....exactly what I was looking for...ask and you shall receive !!!  ROOK

The ones mentioned are probably the best ones to use and with the exception of Kars, are the onces I use as well.  If you you want to try Kemptville creek as well, there is a launch at Curry Park off of Curry Street.
If I get out I will post my results..thanks to all who replied....ROOK
